name: Ten Little White Lies Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: First, type in TENLITTLEWHITELIES, just like that.
First, move the H to the end, and change the S into an R.
Now change the first T to a B, reverse the letters in BEN, and move the three letters four places to the right.
Put the letters UT after the R, and make the first T an O.
Change the WI into an LY, and move the LYT to the spot left of the R.
Delete the double letter once (e.g. PP).
Make the I a U, and make the first L an I.
Now make the first L and the second E both Gs.
Finally, put spaces between the words to see the final phrase.
